courses.title: Web Development Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build your first responsive websites from scratch and understand core web development concepts.

courses.title: JavaScript ES6+ Modern Techniques
courses.description: Master modern JavaScript including arrow functions, promises, async/await, modules, and destructuring. Perfect for developers wanting to update their skills.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Principles
courses.description: Understand user interface and user experience design fundamentals. Learn color theory, typography, layout principles, and user research methods.

courses.title: Python for Data Science
courses.description: Introduction to Python programming for data analysis. Learn pandas, NumPy, matplotlib, and basic statistical analysis techniques.

courses.title: Digital Marketing Strategy
courses.description: Build comprehensive digital marketing strategies. Covers SEO, social media marketing, content marketing, and analytics.

courses.title: Mobile App Development with React Native
courses.description: Build cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. Learn navigation, state management, and native module integration.

courses.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
courses.description: Introduction to machine learning algorithms and techniques. Covers supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and practical applications.

courses.title: Graphic Design Essentials
courses.description: Learn fundamental graphic design skills including composition, color, typography, and visual hierarchy. Practice with real-world projects.

courses.title: Advanced CSS and Animations
courses.description: Master advanced CSS techniques including Flexbox, Grid, animations, transitions, and modern layout methods for stunning web interfaces.

courses.title: Content Writing for the Web
courses.description: Write compelling web content that engages readers and ranks well in search engines. Learn SEO writing, storytelling, and content strategy.

courses.title: Database Design and SQL
courses.description: Learn database design principles and SQL programming. Covers normalization, queries, joins, indexes, and database optimization.

courses.title: Cybersecurity Basics
courses.description: Introduction to cybersecurity concepts including network security, encryption, threat detection, and security best practices.

courses.title: Photography Fundamentals
courses.description: Master photography basics including exposure, composition, lighting, and camera settings. Learn to capture stunning images.

courses.title: Node.js Backend Development
courses.description: Build scalable backend applications with Node.js and Express. Learn RESTful APIs, authentication, database integration, and deployment.

courses.title: Cloud Computing with AWS
courses.description: Learn Amazon Web Services fundamentals including EC2, S3, Lambda, and RDS. Deploy and manage cloud infrastructure effectively.

courses.title: Social Media Management
courses.description: Learn to manage social media platforms effectively. Covers content creation, scheduling, analytics, and community engagement strategies.

courses.title: Git and Version Control
courses.description: Master Git version control system. Learn branching, merging, collaboration workflows, and best practices for team development.

courses.title: E-commerce Business Fundamentals
courses.description: Start and grow your online business. Learn product selection, marketing strategies, logistics, and customer service for e-commerce success.
